Package utilities

Class MinesweeperTests

java.lang.Object
utilities.MinesweeperTests
public class MinesweeperTests
extends java.lang.Object
JUnit Testing class that includes test cases for the testable components of the Minesweeper controller, model, utility classes.

>95% Branch, Path, and Statement Coverage for:
  • MinesweeperModel
  • MinesweeperController
  • IllegalStepException
  • IllegalFlagPlacementException
  • Space

Utilizes the following Exception classes:
  • IllegalFlagPlacementException.java
  • IllegalStepException.java
Author:
Katherine Wilson, Giang Huong Pham
